author: NetBrain
description:
Device Type:
Alcatel OmniSwitch
Command:
show ip bgp

samples.content:
-> show ip bgp
Admin Status                         = disabled,
Operational Status                   = down,
Autonomous system Number             = 1,
BGP Router Id                        = 128.0.1.4,
Confederation Id                     = 0,
IGP Synchronization Status           = disabled,
Minimum AS origin interval (seconds) = 15,
Default Local Preference             = 100,
Route Reflection                     = disabled,
Cluster Id                           = 0.0.0.0,
Missing MED Status                   = Best,
Aspath Comparison                    = enabled,
Always Compare MED    = disabled,
Fast External Fail Over              = disabled,
Log Neighbor Changes    = disabled,
Multi path                           = disabled,
Graceful Restart                     = enabled,
Graceful Restart Status              = Not Restarting,
Configured Graceful Restart Interval = 90s,
IPv4 Unicast                         = enabled,
IPv6 Unicast                         = disabled
samples.name: sample1
samples.parserRules: {"parseRule":[{"type":"0","keyWords":{"keyWord":["regex[$admin_status]:Admin Status\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$operational_status]:Operational Status\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$int:autonomous_system_num]:Autonomous system Number\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$bgp_rid]:BGP Router Id\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$confederation_id]:Confederation Id\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$igp_synchronization_status]:IGP Synchronization Status\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$int:minimum_as_origin_interval]:Minimum AS origin interval \\(seconds\\)\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$int:default_local_preference]:Default Local Preference\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$route_reflection]:Route Reflection\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$cluster_id]:Cluster Id\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$missing_med_status]:Missing MED Status\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$aspath_comparison]:Aspath Comparison\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$always_compare_med]:Always Compare MED\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$fast_external_fail_over]:Fast External Fail Over\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$log_nbr_changes]:Log Neighbor Changes\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$multi_path]:Multi path\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$graceful_restart]:Graceful Restart\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$graceful_restart_status]:Graceful Restart Status\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$configured_graceful_restart_interval]:Configured Graceful Restart Interval\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$ipv4_unicast]:IPv4 Unicast\\s+=\\s+(.+),","regex[$ipv6_unicast]:IPv6 Unicast\\s+=\\s+(.+)"]},"statements":[],"variableTypes":{"variableType":["$admin_status:string","$operational_status:string","$autonomous_system_num:int","$bgp_rid:string","$confederation_id:string","$igp_synchronization_status:string","$minimum_as_origin_interval:int","$default_local_preference:int","$route_reflection:string","$cluster_id:string","$missing_med_status:string","$aspath_comparison:string","$always_compare_med:string","$fast_external_fail_over:string","$log_nbr_changes:string","$multi_path:string","$graceful_restart:string","$graceful_restart_status:string","$configured_graceful_restart_interval:string","$ipv4_unicast:string","$ipv6_unicast:string"]},"xxid":"7d90b209-33b9-a7f5-bc6e-c807133d79f5"}]}

variables.desc: Indicates whether the BGP protocol has been enabled or disabled through the??ip bgp admin-state??command.
variables.name: $admin_status

variables.desc: Indicates if the local BGP speaker is actively participating in BGP messages, update, routing advertisements.
variables.name: $operational_status

variables.desc: The AS assigned to the local BGP speaker through the??ip bgp autonomous-system??command.
variables.name: $autonomous_system_num

variables.desc: The IP address for the local BGP speaker.
variables.name: $bgp_rid

variables.desc: Shows the confederation number assigned to the local BGP speaker.
variables.name: $confederation_id

variables.desc: Indicates whether BGP is synchronizing its routing tables with those on non-BGP routers handling IGP traffic (such as a RIP or OSPF router).
variables.name: $igp_synchronization_status

variables.desc: The frequency, in seconds, at which routes local to the autonomous system are advertised.
variables.name: $minimum_as_origin_interval

variables.desc: The local preference that will be assigned to routes that do not already contain a local preference value.
variables.name: $default_local_preference

variables.desc: Indicates whether the local BGP speaker is acting as a route reflector for its AS.
variables.name: $route_reflection

variables.desc: The IP address for cluster in route reflector configurations using multi??ple, redundant route reflectors.
variables.name: $cluster_id

variables.desc: Indicates the MED value that will be assigned to paths that do not con??tain MED values.
variables.name: $missing_med_status

variables.desc: Indicates whether the AS path will be in used in determining the best route.
variables.name: $aspath_comparison

variables.desc: Indicates whether multi-exit discriminator (MED) values are being compared only for internal peers or also for external peers.
variables.name: $always_compare_med

variables.desc: Indicates whether Fast External Failover has been enabled or disabled.
variables.name: $fast_external_fail_over

variables.desc: Indicates whether logging of peer state changes is enabled or disabled.
variables.name: $log_nbr_changes

variables.desc: Indicates whether support for multiple equal cost paths is enabled or disabled.
variables.name: $multi_path

variables.desc: Indicates whether graceful restart is enabled or disabled.
variables.name: $graceful_restart

variables.desc: Indicates the graceful restart state.
variables.name: $graceful_restart_status

variables.desc: Indicates the timer for achieving a graceful restart.
variables.name: $configured_graceful_restart_interval

variables.desc: Indicates whether IPv4 unicast is enabled or disabled.
variables.name: $ipv4_unicast

variables.desc: Indicates whether IPv6 unicast is enabled or disabled.
variables.name: $ipv6_unicast
